status_type_id.description: The status type ID set in the UI, the default values are `1` = Home, `2` = Travel, `3` = Custom and `4` = Office

people_id.description: The ID of the person assigned to this status

status_name.description: The name used for a custom status (`status_type_id` = `3`), all other types show the name as null

repeat_state.description: Frequency that this status repeats. `0` = No repeat, `1` = Weekly, `2` = Monthly, `3` = Every two weeks, `4` = Every three weeks, `5` = Every six weeks, `6` = Every two months, `7` = Every three months, `8` = Every six months, `9` = Yearly

repeat_end_date.description: Date that the repeating status will cease

created_by.description: Account ID of person who created this status

modified_by.description: Account ID of person who last modified this status
